column1: Little Goat Diner////My second time at this joint
column2: and the Parathas Burrito (under the Cereal Killers section) blew me away. I wasn't expecting the fresh salad mound on top
column3: and it was so full of flavor. Big size
column4: too! The beer selection wasn't very extensive
column5: lacking in the darker beers with a single stout
column6: but the other cocktails looked nice. I've also had the Goat Chili
column7: and that was a nice side if you're looking to really fill up. So many exciting and unique menu items
